category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
definition: The Man Golfing, Type-3 emoji is a sequence of the ?? Golfer, ?? Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-3, ? Male Sign and ? Variation Selector-16  http://emojipedia.org/man-golfing-type-3/
name: man golfing: medium-light skin tone
note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man golfing emoji with medium-light skin tone is depicted in a moment of focused athletic action. The golfer's attire is rendered with a sense of athletic wear, featuring subtle textures and realistic lighting that give it depth. Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and soft rounded edges define the scene, from the clean lines of the golf club to the implied stance of the player. This emoji on Apple devices captures the pursuit of precision, leisure activities, and the joy of sport.
